data.name: Thin Ice
data.detailed_description: When Sadie Sanderson's husband Hunter doesn't return from his annual fishing trip, it's up to her to take up the investigation. Help Sadie uncover the secrets of idyllic Sandy Lake Village. Solve challenging puzzles set in a rich pixel art environment. Follow the clues and discover the truth behind Hunter's disappearance.
data.about_the_game: When Sadie Sanderson's husband Hunter doesn't return from his annual fishing trip, it's up to her to take up the investigation. Help Sadie uncover the secrets of idyllic Sandy Lake Village. Solve challenging puzzles set in a rich pixel art environment. Follow the clues and discover the truth behind Hunter's disappearance.
data.short_description: Thin Ice is a point and click adventure game set in the beautiful and mysterious town of Sandy Lake Village. Meet curious characters, solve challenging puzzles and uncover what lies beneath the surface of this idyllic setting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0 Capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 4.0 Capabilities
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
